scripts.build_outgoing: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && webpack && npm run copy_outgoing
scripts.copy_outgoing: cpx src/appsscript.json dist && cp build/outgoing.bundle.js dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy_outgoing: npm run build_outgoing && cp .clasp.outgoing.json .clasp.json && clasp push
scripts.build_slashcommand: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && webpack && npm run copy_slashcommand
scripts.copy_slashcommand: cpx src/appsscript.json dist && cp build/slashcommand.bundle.js dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy_slashcommand: npm run build_slashcommand && cp .clasp.slashcommand.json .clasp.json && clasp push
